name: Manor Aenigma
description:
A game for those who seek to find a way to leave their world behind

Is your faith enough to enter the manor? An intricate puzzle, a story that will amaze you!

No love is eternal, not even the sickest and most corrupt.

Seek the answer in the Manor and perhaps you will find the key to unlock the unknown...

Your only friend is light, mistrust the dark, do not underestimate the dark power of the shadow that watches over you.

Some say that the Black Mirror reflects the dark faults of the past, actually it only reflects what you are.

You've met with a terrible fate, haven't you?

LANGUAGE

Audio: English, Italiano
Subtitles: English, Italiano
Default: English
